name: Fahreza Aldryan Maualana
description: As a student at Semarang State Polytechnic, I am dedicated to the development and assembly of appropriate technology, specifically microcontroller-based systems, and the practical implementation of sensors in industrial applications. I have a proven track record in building IoT solutions and integrating various other sensors. My core skills lie in programming with Python and C, and I am proficient in IoT project creation. Concurrently, I am employed part-time as kitchen staff at a cafe.
